conbody.p: Eucalyptus 4.1.0 resolves issues listed in the following table.

row.entry: Issue
Description
Support for sharing snapshots
DNS property reset results in broken euca admin commands.
CID-10303 Resource Leak: The system resource will not be reclaimed and reused, reducing the future availability of the resource
need euca_conf command for registering cloudformation service
Enabling debug should not enable JMX management
Once create a keypair with the name abc`~!@#$%^&*()_+0-+{}[]|\:;<>?><,., it cannot be deleted using euca2ools
Resource admin persona should not be able to manage resources owned by system accounts
Update eucarc variables to current convention
Service builder error logged for user api service group
Port not updated in eucarc credentials when bootstrap.webservices.port is set
Use system shared SecureRandom where possible
S3 client settings should be configurable
Upgrading to Eucalyptus 4.0, objectstorage.providerclient should be set to 'walrus'
euca-bundle-instance does not allow you to use existing buckets
Create user path differences between Euca and AWS
Missing description for property dns.services.hostmapping
Support dependency injection (JSR-330) for service components
VPCS - Basic CR_D actions
VPCS - Minimal run instance changes for VPC
VPCS - Broadcast network view
VPCS - Tagging / Filtering for VPC resources
VPCS - VPC Security groups
VPCS - User managed network interface for instances
VPCS - Network ACL management
VPCS - VPC attribute management
VPCS - Default VPC
Use schemas rather than databases for persistence contexts
SWF - Registration actions
SWF - Happy workflow actions
SWF - Workflow failure actions
SWF - Long polling
SWF - Heartbeat and cancellation
SWF - Counts and listings
unable to attach volume to stopped instance, but success is reported
Cloudformation -- test against SWF
Correlation ID - Refactoring data paths for the basic resource consuming OPs
Correlation ID - Reference implementation of cloud-admin interface
install and document Ceph
Investigate appropriate interaction with Ceph
SC->NC integration for messaging of export/unexport volumes
policy denial for IAM call gives different results on AWS vs Eucalyptus
Organize known BDM bugs.
Identify any architectural changes, if any, needed by BDM fixes.
Auto Scaling - DescribeMetricCollectionTypes repeats 1Minute granularity
VPCS - Basic resource relation actions
Reply for undefined metadata entry contains stack trace
Hibernate second level cache should be disabled when initializing cloud
Instance Reservation min-max failing when max is not available
EC2 modify instance attributes failing for block device mapping delete on terminate
Remove ceph from list of possible object storage provider clients
VPCS - Subnet free address tracking
startup.log file needs timestamps.
Service-side logging of user requests
Remove temporary -D options from CF
SWF - Workflow execution history management
SWF - Request message validation
SWF - Client framework and cloud formation integration
SWF - Timers
VPCS - Request message validation
Correlation ID - Independent log files
VPCS - Public DNS name management
Correlation ID - Improvement in C components
Support multiple Ceph pools per Eucalyptus cluster
Configurable property for ceph's configuration file
VPCS - ELB for VPC
Move cloudformation out of tech preview
C Code Warning Causing some Errors
Missing license for rados-0.1.4.jar (ceph)
Creating a new VPC security group does not set the default outbound rule to be "-1 0.0.0.0/0"
BundleInstance is broken when using session credentials
SWF - Service available for use by cloud formation
SWF - Service not available for use by cloud users by default
ELB should remove registered instances that have been terminated
SWF causes cloudformation to hang
SWF - Clean up for deprecated resources
Limit of 2 access keys and signing certs per user should be enforced
Snapshots remain exported to SC when upload to OSG is turned off
HTTP metadata (Content-Encoding, etc) dropped in object PUT/copy to backend
Investigate if some jars are no longer in used and can be removed from distribution
VPC - Metadata Service
Blockstorage setting is no longer idempotent
EC2 instance DNS names have trailing dot
Terminating instance twice should not delete instance record
Delete object should always return a unique delete marker if the bucket versioning is enabled
Instance types allow invalid values for cpu, disk, and memory
CloudFormation template and parameter values are logged in cloud-requests.log including NoEcho values
"eucalyptus" and "walrus" DNS results contain cache-poisoning authority records
MessageContexts caches messages
SWF should not fail request when timer limit exceeded
Reporting/CW service lifecycle changes
Workflow launching DB instance
Cannot create a new auto scaling group with boto when a VPC option is specified
TypeMapper error logged on startup
Cloudformation nested stacks
Authentication errors for Simple Workflow service are not JSON format
CloudFormation stack workflow fails due to SWF deadlock
Duplicate key constraint in EC2 if instances launched in quick succession/simultaneously
Node's state while in Edge networking mode should include eucanetd status
OSG returns AccessDenied error when download URLs contain "response-content-disposition" header
S3 object downloads should limit size
cloudformation hangs on swf event mismatch
Cloudformation stack name should only allow alphanumeric characters
Error thrown when binding factory is empty
ELB should ignore scheme/internet-facing with EC2-Classic
VPC load balancer creation fails for accounts other than eucalyptus
disable SSLv3 on public APIs
Add SimpleWorkflow service to eucarc
IAM GetUserPolicy policy document should be urlencoded
DB instance doesn't work after IP changes
VPC: Warning every 30s that temp file cannot be deleted
CC Crashing constantly
Packaging - Include librbd1 and librados2 as dependencies for eucalyptus-block-storage
Access key quotas check the calling user's quotas, not the key owner's
DescribeNetworkAcls filtering by protocol name does not work
Instance metadata service should only permit explicit access in VPC mode
Cloudformation causing replay detection on SWF service
Fatal bootstrap error logged on startup
CloudFormation workflow worker shutdown errors logged
NetworkAclEntry has no default for Egress
Restored failed instances should be omitted from network view
Network JSON should be updated for VPCMIDO settings / requirements
VPC describe responses incorrectly suffixed with "Type"
Upgrade tasks using incorrect database
Storage property "storage.lunmigrationtimeout" using minutes not hours with EMC backend
validate template (CF) does not support template url
VPC: Instances always receiving 8.8.8.8 as DNS server, despite network json config
Node state is not accurately represented by describe nodes
VPC resources cannot be deleted by cloud/resource administrator
SimpleWorkflow service should depend on pollednotifications
Eucalyptus prevents adding 10 tags when creating a new scaling group
Auto scaling response messages use back-end message identifier
CloudFormation date format is inconsistent
Error / stacktrace logged for missing network group (meta-data)
Error logged when instance terminated immediately after run
Error transferring snapshot - No such property: copiedHeaders for class: com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.msgs.UploadPartType
DescribeBundleTasks response is verbose by default for administrator
Add support for EC2 2014-10-01 API version
Signing certificiate limit counts revoked certificates
client/log tracking commands fail when EUCALYPTUS=/ environment variable is missing.
invalid subnet to euca-run-instances
user defined metadata and header metadata is not returned by the OSG
Use shorter database password for compatibility with postgres client tools
Fetching VPC subnets doesn't work on Eucalyptus when the 'vpcId' filter param is used
DeleteRole fails with "No such role" when referenced from an instance profile
Database upgrade export file location incorrect
unable to delete stack if network interface id has a null physical resource id
CloudFormation: template-url cannot consume HTTPS resources
Eucalyptus admin should be able to manipulate CF stacks of other accounts
ELB instance fails to run with VPC
Add user column to euca-req-history
CloudFormation: stack's template not written to DB
SC goes into NOTREADY state
Java/Groovy source files missing license header
VPC: elastic IPs getting into a state where they cannot be disassociated/released
CloudFormation stack names should allow dash
VPC: elastic IP behavior odd for some associate/disassociate procedures
No mechanism to adjust default password expiry in eucaconsole
nc.log - statements with new lines/line breaks don't get logged correctly
nslookup fails to resolve public address to public DNS name
Simpleworkflow cloud properties should be renamed
euca-describe-volumes --filter attachment.device does not appear to be working
"Uncaught exception in decision worker" after cloudformation deregistration
Creating Cloudformation Stack with alphanumeric name less than 255 characters returns an odd error
Routing Table and Security Group Fail to Delete After Successful Cloudformation Deployment on VPC-enabled Cloud
Snapshots Shared With Another Account Aren't Viewable
Upgrade fails on connection to database
VPC: Private hostname not set for instances in non-default VPC
Deleting volume results InternalFailure when in use
CloudFormation creation of ELB resource fails
Autoscaling ELB type health check always reports as healthy
CloudFormation stack create/delete poor performance
console should allow admin to specify account as part of url, and pre-fill the login page accordingly
Update UI Easter Eggs
A few issue of Eucalyptus-console UI functions
mis-set values in console.ini are hard to diagnose
Tries to associate IP to stopped instances and fails
instance landing page's tiles only display the image ID, could also display image name
Create Launch config and launch instance wizards won't allow adding more than one security group
Instance landing page's table view is missing many menu options
Protection against AngularJS expression injections
DOC - Image detail page
Launch instance wizard should only show instance types that image can run on
forced clearing of password field is also clearing username field on login screen
inbound rules extend outside their container when security group name in rule is super long
When console is used to log in to AWS and to Euca, AWS log in page gets pre-populated with Euca creds
when an IAM user is created with the name {{1+4}}, no error message shows up.
There is no input validation for negative numbers for volume size in "Advanced options" of Launch instance wizard
2nd attempt to view console output shows blank
Create security group panel does not check for the duplicated rule when the protocol is changed in the middle of flow
On the instance detail page, there is no link to the currently using elastic IP detail page
On the instance volume page, while a volume is detaching, the detach dialog is still accessible.
The register snapshot dialog is missing the loading icon when the submit is clicked
on the resource detail pages, the 'add tag' button should react to the pressing enter key, not the 'save changes' button
Cannot access the scaling group/launch config's detail page when "/" is used in the name
On the create launch config wizard, after using the image filter, some images get lost
Launchconfig and instance landing pages' keypair filters are missing the option for "None"
Launch config detail page does not display the advanced options
Instance detail page is missing a link to the keypair
In case of a long scaling group name, the landing page table stretches and cannot reach the dropdown menu
on AWS, cannot remove the terminated instances
When a new security group with empty rules is created using the create security group dialog, the warning display is missing the link
Able to create a security group with the name abc`~!@#$%^&*()_+0-+{}[]|\:;<>?><,.
add ability to select and order instance termination policies for scaling groups
Add ability to add/remove tiles on the dashboard
smarter access to IAM
Revisit context-sensitive escaping
Centralized cache service for Management Console
Disassociate IP dialog on the instance detail page does not pick up the latest IP value if updated
Instance volume page does not update its available volume list when detached on the page
IAM group detail page does not perform live validation on the group's name
revoke_all_rules could leave group without rules if error interrupts
"/" is not escaped in create new key pairs dialog.
in the launch instance wizard, clicking the create key pair button does not open the create key pair dialog the first time, but causes the key pair field to throw a validation error
When new key pair contains "\" in the name it throws a "keypair already exists" error
On AWS, you cannot launch instance with 'private address only' option
On the create alarm dialog, the instance list displays all instances including the terminated
The instance detail page does not show the correct kernel and ramdisk IDs.
Create Alarm dialog doesn't come up empty if it was already used
Create Alarm may overwrite existing alarm without warning
create scaling group checkbox is not present on step 4 of the launch config wizard
Create key pair operations on launch wizards display unnecessary copy-paste key pair dialog
"add policy" needs to be more specific about the fact that these are scaling policies
browser is not notifying me if I try to move focus away from a page or tab that has unsaved changes
support sharing images (public and with specific users)
On IAM user detail page, cannot open the dropdown menu on the group tiles if the group name contains special chars.
After scaling group is deleted and instances in scaling group were terminated they show in dashboard count for a long while
On IAM policy generator, a validation error message shows up immediately after a template is selected.
search value not honored when smart refresh in effect
On IAM user detail page, when a quota value is entered 0, it shows a long error notification, but the value stays 0.
If username contains + char, add policy page results in "BeakerException: Cookie value is too long to store" error
remove "delete on terminate" flag in launch config wizard bdm editor
Display user data for instances and launch configs. Support modifying user data for stopped instances.
Quota policy does not show up until exit and re-enter user detail view
policy wizard doesn't handle refresh when session times out
need an at-a-glance way to indicate in the relevant places that a security group has no rules
"Create new volume" page lets me add eleven tags, blows up later
Can't edit ports after selecting protocol for security group rules
Use instance to create image
modify image attributes
When security group is created, confirmation message does not show s. group name.
Show service endpoint health
Cancel bundle task for instance-store images
"add user to group" on user detail page button should be disabled until a group is selected in the widget
Need desktop icon for IAM Roles
implement IAM roles in console
smart refresh interferes with actions menu selection
launch instance wizard goes back to step 2 without explanation.
launch wizard and create launch configuration: security tab create key pair and create security group missing "OR:" text
Deleted key pair still clickable on instance landing page
Show image status and progress on image landing page and image detail page
Exceeding quota error takes too long to trigger
The success notification message shows up empty on the latest develop branch.
Unable to paste public key into Public SSH Key Contents field using IE 11
In AWS, Instances, 'Remove from view' doesn't work.
IAM Policy Generator page loads too slowly
Cancel links are missing and/or broken in the launch config and launch instance wizards
Attach volume from instance should provide link to create volume if no volumes in the same AZ exist
sg rules and IAM users, when added, do not have correct styling applied
allocate IPs dialog should have "1" as default value
Using Angular's $location service with html5Mode set disables links on the page
Wireframe VPC (minimum required for using, not creating VPCs)
Implement VPC Instance and Launch Config wizards
convert walrus wireframes to 4.0 LnF
Upgrade AngularJS to latest version
wireframe manage accounts via GUI
wireframe configure VM types
Status lines in service status tile on dashboard appear as links
Deleted volumes are still clickable on snapshot landing page

Create Launch Configuration button still enabled after deselecting Key name in LC wizard.
link to instance on IAM role detail page appears to be broken

Delayed error when adding invalid path to IAM User
Tags filter on landing pages is susceptible to Angular expression injections
When IS image is bundling, we fail to warn about another bundling attempt
After creating a new keypair on launch wizard, when user does not download the keypair file, the create keypair modal is stuck

icon development for buckets on dashboard
cancel image creation (IS)

implement VPC for instance landing page and instance detail pages

implement VPC for EIPS (landing page, detail page, allocate)
implement VPC for create scaling group
implement vpc for scaling group details page
Unable to toggle checkbox inputs on click
validation error is occluded by text entry field on quotas panel
add user steps to warning dialog prior to initiating image creation

show role parameter in launch more instances like this page

Block device mapping editor panel results in JSON parse error on Launch config detail page

implement VPC filters for landing pages
Metadata editor for S3/ObjectStore objects
"pending" link on image detail page has broken link.

Internal Server Error when creating user.
The instance landing page tiles push down the VPC information and make it invisible

VPC subnet fields need to display the VPC subnet CIDR information

Server starts with URL error message

css tweaks for object and bucket details page

need a way to view bucket details from the contents page

when access key limit hit, no error shown when user tries generating new keys.
update custom chosen widget to allow enter key to select value
Fails to create a VPC scaling group
alignment updates for landing page tables

need a little more space between security group selector and create new link in wizards
create bucket sharing options should default to private, manual with current user set to full control
service status tile contents should lazy display
allow manual sharing to be defined by email address as well as account ID

Register snapshot as image throws internal error
Launch instance button does not activate when new security group is created from launch instance widget

file upload barber pole pattern is craaaaaazy looking
instance with long name expands outside container for terminate instance modal

Hide enable/suspend versioning menu items and options from 4.1 console

delete bucket should inform user when invisible versions are present
scaling group details page is not hiding "VPC Network" when no VPC

Manage permissions menu item doesn't link to sharing panel on object details page

Creating an IAM role with "+" char in the name causes the page to fail
No way to enter protocol numbers into VPC security group rules
Copy/Delete menu items on S3/OSG object details page don't do anything
ObjectStore copy/paste fails if object copied onto itself. disallow this.
Delete object doesn't appear to work if object details page is reloaded before clicking "Delete" menu item

package latest gevent to fix dns lookup issue
IAM user detail page won't allow the user name to be updated

quotas panel needs spacing between form rows

error in launch config wizard

convert old-style help to current method with included html

Jasmine,Bower, Grunt, Karma, and PhantomJS integration

404 error when adding users to eucalyptus account

object count on S3 landing pages should be link to contents.
create image should validate new bucket name and prefix

Remove upload warning message for object storage
Leverage CSP header to mitigate XSS attacks in the console
Console's proxy should enforce a limit on the file size for S3 uploads
